title: Login issue, stuck on Authenticating. EUNE
body: When I try to Login it keeps saying ''Authenticating....'' I just wanna know if I can fix it in anyway or something. Never seen this before so just wondering.

replies.body: This can be fixed!  The error usually happens if your connection is struggling to reach the authentication server, so it can't grab your credentials.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and clear those blocks.  Let me know if you have any questions!
